name: DURT
storyline:
DURT is a block-based puzzle game where the deep underground mines have collapsed in on the unfortunate workers and there is only one mole brave enough to dare rescue them from this hazardous environment.

Journey into the 5 unique worlds filled with more than 100 expertly crafted puzzles that maximize each of the block's unique effects. Tunnel through dirt, dodge traps, and manipulate complex contraptions to solve the mine's puzzles and rescue the trapped miners! Once you have bested the story mode, go get your hands dirty creating and sharing your own puzzles using the in-game level editor or explore the community's puzzling creations via the Steam Workshop!
summary: Dig into this block-based puzzle game where you must master the elements of the subterranean world to rescue the miners trapped within. The deeper you delve, the more challenging the rescue becomes.
